subject: Public Speaking
title: Great Speeches That Failed
description: Learn Great Speeches That Failed in one minute.

hook.text: Not every famous speech was effective. Some were eloquent but changed nothing.

buildup.text: A speech succeeds when audiences buy in. Otherwise, eloquence fails.

discovery.text: Audiences reject speeches that feel inauthentic or manipulative.

twist.text: The best orators fail sometimes. Failure teaches what works.

climax.text: Great orators learn from failure and adapt. That's mastery.

punchline.text: Failure is data. Use it to improve.
